verses.verse: My breath <WH7307> is corrupt <WH2254> <WH8795>, my days <WH3117> are extinct <WH2193> <WH8738>, the graves <WH6913> are ready for me.
Are there not mockers <WH2049> with me? and doth not mine eye <WH5869> continue <WH3885> <WH8799> in their provocation <WH4784> <WH8687> ?
Lay down <WH7760> <WH8798> now, put me in a surety <WH6148> <WH8798> with thee; who is he that will strike <WH8628> <WH8735> hands <WH3027> with me?
For thou hast hid <WH6845> <WH8804> their heart <WH3820> from understanding <WH7922>: therefore shalt thou not exalt <WH7311> <WH8787> them.
He that speaketh <WH5046> <WH8686> flattery <WH2506> to his friends <WH7453>, even the eyes <WH5869> of his children <WH1121> shall fail <WH3615> <WH8799>.
He hath made <WH3322> <WH8689> me also a byword <WH4914> of the people <WH5971>; and aforetime <WH6440> I was as a tabret <WH8611>.
Mine eye <WH5869> also is dim <WH3543> <WH8799> by reason of sorrow <WH3708>, and all my members <WH3338> are as a shadow <WH6738>.
Upright <WH3477> men shall be astonied <WH8074> <WH8799> at this, and the innocent <WH5355> shall stir up <WH5782> <WH8709> himself against the hypocrite <WH2611>.
The righteous <WH6662> also shall hold <WH270> <WH8799> on his way <WH1870>, and he that hath clean <WH2890> hands <WH3027> shall be <WH3254> <WH8686> stronger and stronger <WH555>.
But <WH199> as for you all, do ye return <WH7725> <WH8799>, and come now <WH935> <WH8798>: for I cannot find <WH4672> <WH8799> one wise <WH2450> man among you.
My days <WH3117> are past <WH5674> <WH8804>, my purposes <WH2154> are broken off <WH5423> <WH8738>, even the thoughts <WH4180> of my heart <WH3824>.
They change <WH7760> <WH8799> the night <WH3915> into day <WH3117>: the light <WH216> is short <WH7138> because <WH6440> of darkness <WH2822>.
If I wait <WH6960> <WH8762>, the grave <WH7585> is mine house <WH1004>: I have made <WH7502> <WH8765> my bed <WH3326> in the darkness <WH2822>.
I have said <WH7121> <WH8804> to corruption <WH7845>, Thou art my father <WH1>: to the worm <WH7415>, Thou art my mother <WH517>, and my sister <WH269>.
And where is now <WH645> my hope <WH8615>? as for my hope <WH8615>, who shall see <WH7789> <WH8799> it?
They shall go down <WH3381> <WH8799> to the bars <WH905> of the pit <WH7585>, when our rest <WH5183> together <WH3162> is in the dust <WH6083>.
